item.title: Homicide squad interviews mum and partner after death of baby boy near Melbourne
item.description: <p>﻿The one-year-old boy was taken to hospital by his mother and her partner after he became unresponsive at a home in Sebastopol, Ballarat about midday on November 4.</p>

item.title: Classic $120,000 convertible stolen from Victorian home
item.description: <p>T﻿he dark red 1960s Riley Roadster was stolen over the weekend, along with an orange dirt bike.</p>

item.title: Boy, 8, dies at Victorian display home in swimming pool tragedy
item.description: <p>Emergency services were called to reports of a boy found unresponsive in a swimming pool at a home in Kialla yesterday.</p>

item.title: Thousands of bushfire victims seeking $200 million in major class action
item.description: <p>The fire on December 20, 2019, impacted numerous South Australians, destroying more than 80 homes, ravaging over 20,000 hectares, and tragically claiming one life.</p>

item.title: SA government unveils crackdown on costly, dangerous copper theft
item.description: <p>The proposed legislation targets scrap metal dealers, requiring them to be licensed and banning cash transactions.</p>

item.title: Adelaide e-scooter laws under fire following serious crashes
item.description: <p>The use of e-scooters in Adelaide has come under fire after two serious crashes – one of them fatal – with calls for the new laws to be reviewed immediately.</p>

item.title: Murdered grandmother's daughter praised for 'kindness' as killer awaits sentence
item.description: <p>The daughter of a murdered grandmother﻿ has found compassion amid her grief, supporting Ipswich&#x27;s African community after they were subjected to abuse and harassment following the tragedy.</p>

item.title: Driver acquitted of murder over lengthy road-rage chase
item.description: <p>A driver has been acquitted of murder after a hammer-wielding, near-naked man was fatally struck following a road rage-inspired car chase.</p>

item.title: Former Queensland police union boss found dead
item.description: <p>Police confirmed Leavers was found ﻿dead in his Mount Ommaney home around 9.50am today.</p>

item.title: 'Insufficient': Australian scientists debunk Trump's claims linking paracetamol to autism
item.description: <p>Scientists have debunked a claim by US President Donald Trump about a common painkiller causing autism.</p>

item.title: Trump pardons Rudy Giuliani, others involved in efforts to overturn 2020 election
item.description: <p>US President Donald Trump has pardoned Rudy Giuliani and others involved in efforts to overturn the 2020 election, a Justice Department official says.</p>
